Class BreadcrumbStateBorder

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.ui.jbreadcrumb.BreadcrumbStateBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Border
public class BreadcrumbStateBorder extends Object implements Border
Default Border for Breadcrumb states. Border will be drawn with arrow tail and head. Border will be painted using the components background color and outlined with the foreground color.
